name: Modern Shooter Sniper killer
description:
Modern Shooter Sniper Killer is a real sniper shooting game with 3D guns. You take the role as a sniper shooter for army mission based in a sniper's nest, taking out to attack on enemies just like an ultimate sniper expert with fully updated weapons. Many terrorists are coming to attack on your innocent citizen. You are the master sniper hunter and you have to save your people and town from bloody criminal terrorist. This elite killer sniper shooting games with guns and people and stealing cars with airplane mission game is one of the fantastic sniper action game on App Store... Your enemies are wild and beast, they do not care about child, women and senior citizens. You have to teach them a lesson with your assault strike and make a plan against enemy lines and put your strategy against these bloody Pacific Ocean shooters so that they could ever never try to loot civilians of the city.
This game Modern Shooter Sniper Killer for those who love playing sniper games 2017 and Contract Killer game. It is a chance ahead of 2018 to get your hands on the best sniper game. As an expert city, sniper killer who have to kills the terrorists to get things under control and stop the criminal activities inside the city. Qualified with real shadow escape sniper shooting skills and among the top 2017 shooters. Modern Shooter Sniper killer is ready for shoot assassin hunt killing in breakout battle where the winner will be the one who is an expert in sniper shooting in secret stealth mission. Do not get caught in enemy gaze in this extreme sniper shooting battlefield game 2017. Use the best Shadow Target Killer stealth shooting skills. In this game, you have to hunt to take down and eliminate the terrorists, gangsters, robbers, mafia agents, prisoners and other deadly enemies that are the reason behind extreme crime in city.
Modern Shooter Sniper Killer is an action game with so many missions and full of heavy guns. Military army is going to provide you with various super weapons & guns to help you win this elite killer sniper shooting war. You will fully armed with many weapons will be provided by army. In which include pistols to SMGs to help you win this war against terrorists. As elite sniper shooter, you have to kill the entire terrorist successfully and secure the army base to save your city & country. Use your strategy and weapons carefully to kill terrorists. Be careful because they are very dangerous enemies. Do not give your terrorist enemy any chance to counter your attack or strike back.
Features:
• Realistic 3D city Environment
• Very smooth control of sniper guns
• Improve your skills and accomplish critical levels
• Addicting FPS game-play
• Two lethal sniper guns
• Multiple thrilling missions for your enjoyment
• Secret stealth shooting missions for shadow target killer
• Thrilling action packed game
• Ultimate FPS game with deadly sniper rifles
• High quality graphics and best sound effects
To complete the level, you must use your sniper rifle to shoot the entire enemy to play the next level. If you do not get all the enemy soldiers before your health is washed-out, game will be over. Modern Sniper shooter game is a 3D Sniper game. Share this game with your friends and family to enjoy. Have Fun!
